baseCards.name: Inflict
baseCards.text: Deals (P) damage to your opponent. The type of damage is determined by the spell's element.

baseCards.name: Rejuvenate
baseCards.text: Your mana total is set to %d.

baseCards.name: Purchase
baseCards.text: Take a card from the market, and add it to your hand. This spell has no effect if there are no cards in the market.

baseCards.name: Research
baseCards.text: Lose X mana. Draw X cards from the library and add them to your hand.

library.name: Lesser Affliction
library.text: Applies one stack of an affliction to your opponent, of the type associated with this spell's element.

library.name: Greater Affliction
